comments:
If somewhere in a .java source file ,  I have a comment that contains an illegal unicode char (eg: \uabcdef) eclipse correctly displays "Invalid unicode"; if I save the file and try to reopen it later, the following message is displayed:


"Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: An unexpected exception was thrown."
